meanings.definition: Objects made by stringing beads together.
meanings.sent1: She displayed her beautiful beadworks at the craft fair.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy creating intricate beadworks in my spare time.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the beadworks, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: Her beadworks were like tiny mosaics, each bead a piece of the whole.
meanings.sent5: The beadworks shimmered in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: The act of creating objects by stringing beads together.
meanings.sent1: Learning how to make beadworks can be a fun and relaxing hobby.
meanings.sent2: She demonstrated the art of beadworks to the eager students.
meanings.sent3: The beadworks seemed to come alive, dancing on the string as she worked.
meanings.sent4: Her beadworks were a symphony of colors, each bead adding its own note.
meanings.sent5: The beadworks glistened like a treasure, each bead a precious gem.
